{{ title }}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { IMovie } from 'src/app/entities/interface/movies.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-posters', templateUrl: './posters.component.html', styleUrls: ['./posters.component.css'] }) export class PostersComponent { @Input() title: string = ''; @Input() moviesList: IMovie[] = [] constructor(private router: Router) {} showDetail(id: string) { this.router.navigate([`movie/:${id}`]); } }
